name: analyser
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, machine, or device that examines something in detail in order to discover exactly what it is or consists of: a digital image analyser
More examplesFewer examplesH2 was measured with a reduction gas analyser.It is a code analyser and transformer that can prepare Cobol programs for migration from any system.Another pair of helical mirror images is provided by the cochleae, the frequency analysers in our ears.Scrupulous analysers of elections might argue that the proportion of Free Presbyterians in these contests was artificially inflated by the election pact.
